name: Kinetic Managing Style Assessment
shortDescription: Discover how you manage entrepreneurial projects

quadrant1.name: Venturing
quadrant1.description: When facing new ideas or situations, you tend to (1) set priorities based on identifying unknowns and testing assumptions; and (2) oversee processes by delegating responsibility and enabling personal development. Your strength is in trying new approaches and exploring new possibilities. You are keen to promote autonomy and task ownership.

quadrant2.name: Inquisitive
quadrant2.description: When managing entrepreneurial projects, you tend to (1) set priorities based on identifying unknowns and testing assumptions; and (2) oversee processes by setting and enforcing rules or procedures. Your strength is in trying new approaches and exploring new possibilities. You are keen to develop checklists and track progress.

quadrant3.name: Efficient
quadrant3.description: When managing entrepreneurial projects, you tend to (1) set priorities based on specific targets and measurable results; and (2) oversee processes by setting and enforcing rules or procedures. Your strength is in optimizing resources and delivering results. You are keen to develop checklists and track progress.

quadrant4.name: Supportive
quadrant4.description: When facing new ideas or situations, you tend to (1) set priorities based on specific targets and measurable results; and (2) oversee processes by delegating responsibility and enabling personal development. Your strength is in optimizing resources and delivering results. You are keen to promote autonomy and task ownership.

borderNorth.name: Kinetic within learning (Inquisitive and Venturing)
borderNorth.description: When managing entrepreneurial projects, you tend to set priorities based on identifying unknowns and testing assumptions. In overseeing processes, you show flexibility between (1) setting and enforcing rules or procedures and (2) delegating responsibility and enabling personal development. Your strength is in trying new approaches and exploring new possibilities. You are keen to develop checklists and track progress, while also promoting autonomy and task ownership.

borderSouth.name: Kinetic within productivity (Efficient and Supportive)
borderSouth.description: When facing new ideas or situations, you tend to consider options based on clearly defined goals or a sense of purpose. In deliberating action, you show flexibility between (1) a careful assessment of its merits and prospects, and (2) seeking new stimuli, setting things in motion to discover something interesting. Your strength is in organizing information and making sense of the situation. You are keen to determine and agree goals, but you are also comfortable to put things into play and see where this takes you.

borderWest.name: Kinetic within control (Efficient and Inquisitive)
borderWest.description: When managing entrepreneurial projects, you show flexibility in setting priorities based on (1) specific targets and measurable results and (2) identifying unknowns and testing assumptions. You oversee processes by setting and enforcing rules or procedures. Your strength is in optimizing resources and delivering results as well as in trying new approaches and exploring new possibilities.  You are keen to develop checklists and track progress.

borderEast.name: Kinetic within enable (Supportive and Venturing)
borderEast.description: When managing entrepreneurial projects, you show flexibility in setting priorities based on (1) specific targets and measurable results and (2) identifying unknowns and testing assumptions. You oversee processes by delegating responsibility and enabling personal development. Your strength is in optimizing resources and delivering results as well as in trying new approaches and exploring new possibilities. You are keen to promote autonomy and task ownership.

center.name: Fully kinetic manager
center.description: When managing entrepreneurial projects, you show flexibility in setting priorities based on (1) specific targets and measurable results and (2) identifying unknowns and testing assumptions. In overseeing processes, you show flexibility between (1) setting and enforcing rules or procedures and (2) delegating responsibility and enabling personal development. Your strength is in optimizing resources and delivering results as well as in trying new approaches and exploring new possibilities. You are keen to develop checklists and track progress, while also promoting autonomy and task ownership.

homePage.title: Kinetic Managing Style Assessment
homePage.subtitle: Discover how you tend to lead entrepreneurial projects. How do you manage others when developing new products, services or ways of working?

assessmentDetails.heading: Assessment Details:
items: 12 randomized question pairs, in two parts
Remember: There are no right or wrong answers!

homePage.footer: Your privacy is important to us. All assessment data is securely processed and stored.

assessment.title: Kinetic Managing Style Assessment

partIntros.part1: When managing entrepreneurial projects, how do you tend to oversee processes?
partIntros.part2: When managing entrepreneurial projects, how do you tend to set priorities?

assessment.instructions: Use the slider or click the bars above to select a response that reflects your hunch

metadata.description: Two-dimensional kinetic managing style assessment with 4 focused categories
